ships.name: Galactica
ships.text: WHEN DEFENDING: Convert 1 [crit] into a [hit] OR Convert 1 [hit] into a | |

ships.name: Pegasus
ships.text: WHEN THIS SHIP IS DESTROYED: Immediately Perform a maneuver with a speed of 1, straight, bank or turn. IF THIS SHIP OVERLAPS ANOTHER SHIP'S BASE: Roll 4 attack dice against that ship. The defending ship does not roll defense dice.

captains.name: William Adama
captains.text: ACTION: Perform a second maneuver, straight or bank, with a speed of 1 then place an [aux] token beside your ship.

captains.name: William Adama
captains.text: DURING THE ACTIVATION PHASE: Whenever you are instructed to place a Disabled Token on one of your [tech] or [crew] upgrades, place 2 [time] Tokens on this card instead.

captains.name: Saul Tigh
captains.text: DURING THE ACTIVATION PHASE: After executing a green maneuver, perform a free [sensor-echo] action using the 1 straight maneuver template.

admirals.name: William Adama
admirals.text:
<b>FLEET ACTION:
Perform a second maneuver, straight or bank, with a speed of 1 then place an [aux] token beside your ship.

upgrades.name: So Say We All
upgrades.text: ACTION: Discard this card, all friendly ships roll +1 Attack Die for all their attacks this round.

upgrades.name: Dadulas Screen
upgrades.text: DURING THE ACTIVATION PHASE: If an enemy ship ends its maneuver in range DISABLE THIS CARD: Place an [evade] Token next to your ship.

upgrades.name: FTL Drive
upgrades.text: DISABLE THIS CARD: ACTION: Remove this ship from the play area and discard all tokens next to it. AT THE END OF THE ACTIVATION PHASE: Place this ship back in the play area but not within Range 1-2 of an enemy ship. Place and [aux] Token next to your ship.

upgrades.name: Flack Wall
upgrades.text: ATTACK: Roll 2 attack dice against all ships in range.

upgrades.name: Gaius Baltar
upgrades.text: Add 1 [weapon] slot to your ships upgrade bar. WHEN ATTACKING: Disable this card card to re-roll up to 2 of your attack dice.

name: Starbuck
text: Discard this card to rotate your ship 90 Degrees, either left or right. Place an [aux] Token next to your ship.

name: Apollo
text: DURING THE MODIFY ATTACK DICE STEP: Place 3 [time] Tokens on this card to convert one of your [battlestations] to a [crit]

resources.name: Captain's Chair
resources.text: This card can only be assigned to a ship that has a Captain with a printed Captain skill of 5 or higher. ACTIVATION PHASE: Once per game round, after this ship executes a Non-Red Maneuver: Remove a Disabled Token from 1 of the cards equipped to this ship.

others.name: Muon Token
others.text:
This card explains the rules for a Muon Token and serves as a reference to remind players of its effect.

A ship with a Muon Token assigned to it follows these special rules:

1. A Muon Token stays with a ship until it is removed.

2. During the Activation Phase, after the ship moves, the ship takes damage to its Hull equal to the number of its current Maneuver -1. The type of Maneuver does not matter, just the number.

3. After the ship performs a Green or White Maneuver, it can spend an Action to remove the Muon Token.

others.name: Regenerate
others.text: Ships with the [regenerate] icon in their Action Bar may perform the Regenerate Action. A ship that performs the [regenerate] Action immediately repairs 1 damage of its choice to its Hull (critical or normal). A ship cannot attack during the round that it performs the [regenerate] Action.

others.name: Drone Tokens
others.text:
Each Drone Token has a Drone number list on the face, as well as a Captain Skill Number listed on the back. The Drone Tokens are placed in a stack on top of the Captain Card in descending order (from highest to lowest) of their Drone numbers. 

NOTE: The Drone number listed on the token at the top of the stack is always considered the ship’s current Captain Skill. At the start of the game, place the Drone Token that has the starting Captain Skill beside the ship (this will be the reverse side of the Drone Token that reads “START” on the face).

When a Drone Token is used, remove one Token from the top of the stack and flip it over. Then remove the Drone Token that is beside the ship from play and replace it with the token that you just removed from the stack. NOTE: The Captain Skill that is listed on the Token beside the ship should always be equal to the number of Drone Tokens left on the Captain Card.

 You may use Drone Tokens for other Upgrade effects, but not for the text on a disabled Captain if your Captain is disabled.

others.name: Federation
others.text: After you move, you may target 1 friendly Federation ship within Range 1-3 (or your own ship). The target ship immediately removes 1 Disabled Upgrade Token from 1 of its disabled Upgrades as a free Action.

others.name: Dominion
others.text: After you move, you may target 1 friendly Dominion ship within Range 1-2 (or your own ship). The target ship immediately performs an Action on one of its non-disabled [tech] Upgrades as a free Action.

others.name: Romulan
others.text: After you move, you may target 1 friendly Cloaked Romulan ship within Range 1-2 (or your own ship). The target ship immediately performs a [sensor-echo] Action as a free Action.

others.name: Klingon
others.text: After you move, you may target 1 friendly Klingon ship within Range 1-2 (or your own ship). The target ship immediately performs an action on one of its non-disabled [crew] Upgrades as a free Action.

others.name: Independent (Klingon)
others.text: All of your [crew] Upgrades cost -1 SP for all ships in your fleet (including your own ship).

others.name: Independent (Federation)
others.text: After you move, you may target 1 friendly ship within Range 1-2 (or your own ship). The target ship immediately performs an additional white "1" Maneuver (forward, bank or turn).

others.name: Independent (Romulan)
others.text: All your [weapon] Upgrades cost -1 SP for all ships in your fleet (including your own ship).

others.name: Independent (Dominion)
others.text: All of your [tech] Upgrades cost -1 SP for all ships in your fleet (including your own ship).

others.name: First Officer
others.text:
Whenever you perform a [battlestations], [scan], or [evade] Action, you may place 2 Tokens of the appropriate type beside your ship instead of 1.  If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. 

If your Captain's Skill is ever reduced below 4, you may use the Skill Number on this card instead of your Captain's Skill Number.

upgradeSlots.source: Crew to be assigned as First Officer

others.name: Tactical Officer
others.text:
Add 1 [weapon] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. 
During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend a [battlestations] Token to roll +1 attack die. 
During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend a [battlestations] Token to roll +1 defense die.

upgradeSlots.source: Crew to be assigned as Tactical Officer

others.name: Operations Officer
others.text:
Add 1 [crew] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. 
During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may choose one of your attack dice and re-roll that die twice. 
During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may choose one of your defense dice and re-roll that die twice.

upgradeSlots.source: Crew to be assigned as Operations Officer

others.name: Science Officer
others.text:
Add 1 [tech] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. 
Each time you attack, if there is a [scan] Token beside your ship, the defender rolls -2 defense dice instead of -1. 
During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend a [scan] Token to add 1 [evade] result to your roll.

upgradeSlots.source: Crew to be assigned as Science Officer

others.name: Romulan
others.text: When attacking, all other friendly, Romulan ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may choose any number of their attack dice and re-roll them once.

others.name: Independent (Romulan)
others.text: When defending, all other friendly ships within Range 1 of your Flagship gain +1 defense die.

others.name: Klingon
others.text: When attacking, all other friendly Klingon ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may convert 1 blank result into 1 [hit] result.

others.name: Independent (Klingon)
others.text: All other friendly ships within Range 1 of your Flagship gain +1 attack die when attacking at Range 2-3.

others.name: Dominion
others.text: When defending, all other friendly Dominion ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may convert 1 blank result into 1 [evade] result.

others.name: Independent (Dominion)
others.text: After your Flagship moves, you may target 1 other Friendly ship within Range 1 of your Flagship. Target ship immediately performs an extra white or green Maneuver.

others.name: Federation
others.text: When defending, all other friendly Federation ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may choose any number of their defense dice and re-roll them once.

others.name: Independent (Federation)
others.text: After your Flagship moves, you may target 1 other Friendly ship within Range 1 of your Flagship. Target ship immediately performs a 2nd Action listed on its Action Bar as a free Action this round.
